Sanguinetti Who is currently at the University of New Mexico And some friends of ours who are also scientists We have a team and we have the equipment And we have the university affiliations That we need to check this out The right way In other words, to confirm or disconfirm That there is something to this And that's pretty fucking amazing So we'll see It could be people listening to this 10 years from now Are like, oh, so that's how it started Or it could be, no, that was just another tree That was not the tree of life that someone barked up And didn't quite work out So at least we'll be able to know If this is a productive direction or not And just that, just being able to properly look into this Is a lot closer than I thought I'd ever get Well, good luck Is there anything we haven't talked about that you'd like to get into?
